channel.description: Authorization servers Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: no changes needed to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Links to original docs: Authorization servers: https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/auth-servers/ Why is this here?: Group results showed authorization server is a “no consensus” term, which may indicate term confusion and/or differing interpretations by respondents. Page type: Concept Content type: Conceptual overview
